meanings.sent1: The churchgoers gathered every Sunday for the service.
meanings.sent2: The small town has a dedicated group of churchgoers who never miss a Sunday.
meanings.sent3: The churchgoers decided to have a picnic in the churchyard after the service.
meanings.sent4: The churchgoers were like a flock of birds, always returning to the same place.
meanings.sent5: The churchgoers' presence in the pews was a comforting sight for the pastor.
